column4: does anyone know of a basic hardware chat?  or perhaps someone can just answer my question quick: i have 4 dimm slots in a computer, do all ram chips in these slots need to have the same timings?
they need to be of the same generation AFAIK
well, i have an old 512 ram stick in one slot, and i was wondering if i could put in 2 new 1 gig sticks (thus filling 3 of the 4 slots)
